verbose_text: Rice et al. investigated the effect of matrix stiffness on the chemoresistance with a particular focus on the matrix stiffness induced epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT) and the subsequent acquisition of chemoresistance XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
